CANDIDATE.TITLE: Title
CANDIDATE.ADD.ASSESSMENT.QUESTION: Add Assessment Question

HOME.MB.REC.TEXT: Save time thanks to our intelligent system which qualifies, challenges and even forecasts the availability of candidates.
HOME.MB.CONNECT.TEXT: A rich place of exchange with high added value.
HOME.MB.BIGDATA.TEXT: Processing, analysis and cross-referencing of the data collected. Connect professionals and employers. Identify the most mobile profiles or talented candidates.
HOME.MB.CORTEX.TEXT: Thanks to our deeplearning algorithm, we are able to predict the best candidates for you.
HOME.MB.PERFOMANCE.TEXT: Regularly monitor the performance of your employees.
HOME.MB.MARKETPLACE.TEXT: An inter-contract! A package project! Share it all on our Marketplace.
HOME.FUNCTION1.TEXT: We are unique, powerful and full of energy to give the best to our customers and to allow human resources to focus on their activities rather than on technical problems. This is why our videoconferencing tools can put a challenge between the candidates and allow you to easily choose the best of them.
HOME.FUNCTION2.LEAD.TEXT: we are always at your availability
HOME.FUNCTION2.TEXT: You can request an adequate period at your availability for a demonstration of our products with our technical expert 24/24;
HOME.FUNCTION3.LEAD.TEXT: Several Technical Tests available on our platform.
HOME.FUNCTION3.TEXT1: We are able to detect the best candidate through our technical intelligence test, we use the best tools to give the best result.
HOME.FUNCTION3.TEXT2: Each technical test is joined with a score and a Chart Chart on the candidate's skills.
HOME.FUNCTION4.TEXT: Your time is a gold, We use the best techniques to meet the needs of our customers using Artificial Intelligence, Deeplearning and Maching Learning to quickly analyze the mass resumes of candidates
HOME.MEDIA1.TEXT: Simple and fast, fill in your personal information, that of your company and be part of the adventure.
HOME.MEDIA2.TEXT: Our offers are designed and thought to best meet your needs.
HOME.MEDIA3.TEXT: Take advantage of the power of a simple and intuitive tool based on the latest technologies in artificial intelligence and Deeplearning.
HOME.MEDIA4.TEXT1: Can I try before I buy?
HOME.MEDIA4.TEXT2: Yes, you just need to schedule a free trial period with our expert technical team, to allow you to test our features.
HOME.MEDIA5.TEXT1: What payment methods do you accept?
HOME.MEDIA5.TEXT2: Our platform uses highly secure payment methods, we use any type of credit card, visa, master card, etc.
HOME.MEDIA6.TEXT1: Can I modify my subscription later?
HOME.MEDIA6.TEXT2: Yes, you can change your subscription at any time, we take care of your needs.
HOME.MEDIA6.TEXT4: Yes, we are a trusted company, we follow our customers until satisfaction

FOOTER.DEFINITION: Kakoo is a suite of interconnected software that is revolutionizing the business of human resources.
FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Thanks to new technologies, artificial intelligence and big data, we can now challenge a candidate, know if he is available or not but better still guess when to contact him.

jobPost.Quest1.name: What position are you currently seeking to fill?
jobPost.Quest1.desc: Please provide a brief overview of the role
jobPost.Quest2.name: What kind of employment agreement or contract are you offering for this position?

jobPost.Quest4.name: How many years of experience are you looking for this position?
jobPost.Quest5.name: Could you please specify the minimum educational qualifications requirements for Position?
jobPost.Quest6.name: Any certifications or licenses needed? (Please specify if any)
jobPost.Quest7.name: In which language should questions be asked to the candidates?
jobPost.Quest8.name: Please inform me if you'd like to include additional skills or if you'd prefer to move forward with the suggested skills and responsibilities.
jobPost.Quest9.name: If applicable, could you please include details about the salary range, bonuses, benefits (e.g., healthcare, retirement plans), and other perks associated with the [position name]. If you don't have a specific range, you can let me know and we can proceed without it.
jobPost.Quest10.name: Specify Location
jobPost.Quest10.desc: Could you please specify the location (City and country), where you would like to hire the candidate? (Maximum 5 location can be added)
